synopsis.text: Her beauty is striking, yet her misfortune is comical. Her name is Momoko, and she navigates the halls of high school alongside two unique companions: Shibumi, the epitome of cool with her signature glasses, and Mayumi, the embodiment of innocence and gentleness. In a world where words are absent, these three charming girls communicate through expressions, gestures, and sound effects, painting a vivid picture of their everyday lives. This silent anime invites you to immerse yourself in their delightful and amusing adventures, proving that dialogue is not always necessary to convey a captivating story. Join Momoko, Shibumi, and Mayumi as they experience the ups and downs of high school, making the most of their days in their own endearing and entertaining way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
